title.rendered: Student Voices Event Planned For May 2

content.rendered:
We invite you to attend a Student Voices event on Thursday, May 2 at 6 p.m. The event will be held at Division Street Elementary School. Hear from a panel of current students who are committed to making our school community more inclusive. Learn about the district’s No Place for Hate initiative and engage with student representatives from various clubs and activities. Additionally, several community organizations will be in attendance to share the supports they offer. 
 
Free pizza and ice cream will be served! All SSCSD families and school community members are invited to attend.
